qualities.name: Celerity
qualities.effect: Increase base movement rates by 50%

qualities.name: Dermal Deposits
qualities.effect: +2 Natural Armor (Coverage of 4)

qualities.name: Elongated Limbs
qualities.effect: Character has an innate +2 DP bonus in melee due to reach

qualities.name: Low-light vision
qualities.effect: Character has innate low-light vision

qualities.name: Thermographic Vision
qualities.effect: Character has innate thermographic vision

qualities.name: Ambidextrous
qualities.effect: Does not take -2 DP Offhand Weapon penalty

qualities.name: Ambush Predator
qualities.effect: +2 DP when rolling Initiative for Surprise Tests.

qualities.name: Animal Empathy
qualities.effect: +2DP interacting with non-sentient animals and paracritters

qualities.name: AR Savant
qualities.effect: The character may treat Matrix Background Counts as if they were effectively one point lower (offsetting 2 DP of penalties). This applies to Dead Zones, Spam Zones, and Static Zones.

qualities.name: Artificer
qualities.effect: The character may treat Matrix Background Counts as if they were effectively one point lower (offsetting 2 DP of penalties). This applies to Dead Zones, Spam Zones, and Static Zones.

qualities.name: Astral Chameleon
qualities.effect: Astral Signatures only last half as long

qualities.name: Astute
qualities.effect: The character may treat Matrix Background Counts as if they were effectively one point lower (offsetting 2 DP of penalties). This applies to Dead Zones, Spam Zones, and Static Zones.

qualities.name: Awakened
qualities.effect: The character is Awakened

qualities.name: Beast Mode
qualities.effect: The character may treat Matrix Background Counts as if they were effectively one point lower (offsetting 2 DP of penalties). This applies to Dead Zones, Spam Zones, and Static Zones.

qualities.name: Bilingual
qualities.effect: The character may treat Matrix Background Counts as if they were effectively one point lower (offsetting 2 DP of penalties). This applies to Dead Zones, Spam Zones, and Static Zones.

qualities.name: Black Market Pipeline
qualities.effect: The character may treat Matrix Background Counts as if they were effectively one point lower (offsetting 2 DP of penalties). This applies to Dead Zones, Spam Zones, and Static Zones.

qualities.name: Blandness
qualities.effect: -2 DP to remember or identify the character if they weren't acting memorably. This effect applies to the physical plane.

qualities.name: Compression Algorithm
qualities.effect: -2 DP to remember or identify the character if they weren't acting memorably. This effect applies to the physical plane.

qualities.name: Digital Shadow
qualities.effect: -2 DP to remember or identify the character if they weren't acting memorably. This effect applies to the physical plane.

qualities.name: Double Jointed
qualities.effect: +2 DP when attempting to escape restraints, defend against Subduing Combat, or otherwise contort the body

qualities.name: Erased
qualities.effect: When using a fake ID, the ID receives a +2 DP bonus. This does not apply to a one-time use of Forge Credentials, but it would absolutely apply to an identity made via Forgery.

qualities.name: First Impression
qualities.effect: +2 DP for first social encounter

qualities.name: Focused Concentration
qualities.effect: Allows the character to ignore 2 DP of sustained program / sustained spell / bound spirit / registered sprite penalties.

qualities.name: Geomantic Instincts
qualities.effect: The character may treat Background Counts as if they were effectively one point lower (offsetting 2 DP of penalties). This applies to both Mana Ebbs and Mana Flows.

qualities.name: Guts
qualities.effect: +2 DP vs fear effects

qualities.name: High Pain Tolerance
qualities.effect: Allows the character to ignore two boxes of wound penalties

qualities.name: Home Ground
qualities.effect: +2 DP to all active skill tests while on home turf (building or small neighborhood). +2 to all knowledge tests about it as well.

qualities.name: Human-Looking
qualities.effect: Allows dwarves, elves, and orks to pass as human.

qualities.name: Initiate
qualities.effect: Allows a character’s MAG to exceed their ESS by 1 point. May be taken multiple times. This does NOT increase the MAG attribute itself; MAG is treated as a normal attribute, and is increased in the normal way.

qualities.name: Iron Will
qualities.effect: +2 DP vs. WIL-related soak rolls

qualities.name: Lightning Reflexes
qualities.effect: +2DP for REA-related defense rolls

qualities.name: Mana Resistance
qualities.effect: +2 DP vs. all mana-based effects; any attempts to benefit the character with a mana-based spell or power is at a -2 DP penalty.
